Maintenance MySQL &#8211; Job Sheets Android: jobsheet_report_open

Jun 23, 2014 • Dave

CREATE VIEW jobsheet_report_open AS
SELECT * FROM jobsheet_report_last_entry
WHERE jr_jobcomp=0
OR jr_jobcomp IS NULL ;
